about_the_game:
Embark on this thrilling adventure and discover the limitless potential of the dreamworld in Oneironaut. Navigate through mesmerizing landscapes, outsmart the Dreampolice, and unlock the secrets hidden within the minds of the world's greatest artists. Are you ready to become a master of dreams?

In Oneironaut, you embody the essence of an oneironaut, traversing through these vivid dreamscapes with a sense of purpose and curiosity. Each dream you enter is a testament to the boundless creativity of the human mind, offering a glimpse into the inner worlds of artists and their unfiltered visions. As you master the art of oneironautics, the dreamworld becomes a canvas for your adventures, waiting to be explored and understood.

Oneironautics is not just a concept but a practice that delves into the realm of lucid dreaming, where the dreamer becomes aware that they are dreaming and can exert some degree of control over their actions and environment within the dream. This ability transforms the dream state into an expansive, interactive playground where imagination and reality blur, creating endless possibilities for exploration and self-discovery.


"Oneironautics (/əneɪroʊˈnɔːtɪks/) refers to the ability to travel within a dream on a conscious basis. Such a traveler in a dream may be called an oneironaut."

Game Features:
  • Parkour
  • Freerunning
  • Scoring System
  • Trick Challenges
  • Multiple Maps
  • Third and Cinematic Camera
  • Ragdoll/Bail Button
  • Pause menu
  • Original in-game Music
  • etheral elements (Art & atmospheric music in combination)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur)
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (Apple M1)
  • Sound Card: No

name: The Oneironaut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent or AMD FX-4100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into the surreal world of 'The Oneironaut,' where you'll race through the dreams of artists in this mesmerizing parkour runner. Jump, slide, and vault your way through fantastical landscapes, with each airborne vault propelling you to greater heights.
